Key terms: CT Log (append-only ledger), SCT (proof of logging), STH (tree head), Merkle Tree (integrity), Precertificate. Tools: crt.sh, ctlogs.dev. Big picture: NIST CSF Collection/Detect for passive OSINT threat hunting. Prerequisites: SSL/TLS certs, CAs. Incorporate: - Bloom's Taxonomy: Cover all 6 objectives evenly. - Scaffolding: Distribute cards across 4 layers. - Active Learning: Include prompts referencing discussion, peer teaching, problem-solving. - Voter Priorities: Explicit links to prior knowledge, measurable verbs, real-world (DigiNotar), hyperlinks (crt.sh, RFCs). Output ONLY a JSON array: [{'front': '...', 'back': {'answer': '...', 'explanation': '...', 'bloom_level': '...', 'scaffolding_layer': 1, 'prerequisite_link': '...', 'related_objectives': [1,3]}} , ...] Generate now.
